name: Super Duper Flag Master
description:
Hello!

'Super Duper Flag Master' is a 2D platformer where you control a robot with the only objective of getting the Flag at the end of the level and bringing it back.

'Super Duper Flag Master'  is currently Under Development!

ChapterStatusChapter 1 - NailsDone!Chapter 2 - Nails ShooterDone!Chapter 3 - Speeders and JumpersDone!Chapter 4 - Moving PlatformsUnder DevelopmentChapter 5 - LeversUnder DevelopmentChapter 6 - EscapeUnder Development

Controls

Super Duper Flag Master supports Keyboard and Xbox 360 Controllers

ActionXbox ControllerKeyboardMovementD-Pad or Left Analog StickArrow KeysJump(A) ButtonXRun(X) ButtonZPauseStart ButtonP
